name.ja: トリックスター・ディフュージョン

text.en:
Activate 1 of these effects;
● Fusion Summon 1 "Trickstar" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing its materials from your GY.
● Immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 "Trickstar" monster.
You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Trickstar" monster you control; this turn, your opponent's monsters cannot target monsters for attacks, except that monster, while you control it. You can only use each effect of "Trickstar Diffusion" once per turn.
